title: Baby stops crying the MOMENT mum gives her wheat crackers
text:
A hilarious video has emerged of a baby who is hysterically crying and immediately stops once they are fed a wheat cracker.

The little girl weeps before she is handed two savoury biscuits and lets out a sigh in the Bedminster family home, New Jersey, USA.

Acknowledging the tasty snack in front of her, a small grin spreads across her face, in the clip posted on October 12.

A baby was left whimpering and sobbing after her mother took away a wheat biscuit (pictured) and immediately went quiet when she gave it back in Bedminster, New Jersey, USA

She lets out a loud glee in the excitement and realisation that the crackers are for her.

But it is only a matter of seconds before the baby's mother, who is filming, takes them away and can be heard giggling at her daughter's attempts.

Within seconds, she starts crying again and launches herself towards her mother and sobs - begging to get the crackers back.

The mother says 'you're so happy!' as her daughter clambers on to the sofa at the end of the clip, clutching her biscuits. She lets out a gleeful noise near the beginning (pictured) before her mother takes them away

Moments later, the camera shifts to the play room and the baby grabs them with her tiny hands.

She takes a delicate bite out of the cracker as the mother can be heard laughing about all the fuss.

The mother starts chuckling to her baby, who is crawling on to the sofa, and says 'you're so happy!'

Pleased as punch: The little girl absorbs herself in the snack in front of her and seems overjoyed before taking a delicate bite out of them
description: A baby has been seen hysterically crying after her mother tempted her with wheat crackers and then took them away in their Bedminster home, New Jersey, USA,  in a clip posted on October 12.
